event.name: RSSDI 2025 - 53rd Annual Conference
event.theme: Innovations in Diabetes Care and Research
event.description: The RSSDI 2025 annual conference brings together healthcare professionals, researchers, students, and industry leaders to explore the latest developments in diabetes research, clinical management, medical devices, and digital healthcare solutions. The event will feature keynote lectures, panel discussions, workshops, poster presentations, an exhibition, and networking sessions.

venue.name: Lulu Bolgatty International Convention Centre (LBICC)
venue.description: LBICC is a state-of-the-art convention centre located by the waterfront, featuring multiple ballrooms, breakout halls, exhibition foyers, and outdoor lawns, all integrated with Grand Hyatt Kochi Bolgatty.

organizers.name: Dr. Jothydev Kesavadev
organizers.bio: Endocrinologist and founder of Jothydevâ€™s Diabetes Research Centre.

organizers.name: Dr. Anita Nambiar
organizers.bio: Consultant diabetologist with expertise in gestational diabetes management.

organizers.name: Dr. Anuj Maheshwari
organizers.bio: Specialist in clinical diabetes research and education.

organizers.name: Dr. Rafiq Mohamed
organizers.bio: Consultant endocrinologist and senior faculty at Kerala RSSDI chapter.

rooms.name: Vembanad Ballroom
rooms.description: The largest pillarless ballroom at LBICC, typically used for plenary sessions, keynote addresses, and high-attendance ceremonies. Equipped with advanced sound systems, dual screens, and simultaneous translation booths.

rooms.name: Liwa I
rooms.description: A medium-sized hall connected to Liwa II and III. Frequently used for parallel breakout sessions and medium workshops.

rooms.name: Liwa II
rooms.description: Connected to Liwa I and Liwa III. Often combined with others to create larger halls. Suitable for breakout technical sessions.

rooms.name: Liwa III
rooms.description: A flexible breakout space, often used for sponsor sessions and smaller technical meetings.

rooms.name: Diwan
rooms.description: An intimate meeting hall ideal for panel discussions and clinical debates. Equipped with tiered seating.

rooms.name: Natika
rooms.description: Small meeting room used for poster presentations, student competitions, and informal gatherings.

emergency_services.location: First Aid Room, near Natika Hall

exhibits.position: Left side of entrance, near RR2
exhibits.description: Showcasing the latest generation of blood glucose meters and mobile app integrations.
Exhibiting innovative oral diabetes medications and insulin delivery systems.
Demonstrating smart insulin pumps, wearable glucose monitors, and AI-driven health tracking.
Offering sugar-free, diabetic-friendly snacks and beverages.

sessions.title: Opening Ceremony & Keynote
sessions.speaker: Dr. Anuj Maheshwari
sessions.description: Inauguration of RSSDI 2025 followed by keynote on the future of diabetes care in India.

sessions.title: Digital Health & Diabetes Apps
sessions.speaker: Panel of experts
sessions.description: Discussion on mobile health apps, AI in diabetes care, and telemedicine integration.

sessions.title: Poster Presentation Competition
sessions.speaker: Student Delegates
sessions.description: Students and young researchers present posters on innovative diabetes research.

parking.overflow: Additional parking at Bolgatty Palace Grounds

drop_off_points.description: Delegate and VIP drop-off zone with wheelchair access.
